programme.title: HK Best Of's - Best of TKO's 2015 Spring - Episode 2

programme.title: Fighter Profile: Anton Tokarchuk
programme.sub-title: Fighter Profile: Anton Tokarchuk
programme.desc: Every athlete has their own unique way to be the best. We focus on the details of their training and why they think they have been successful. Gain insight on the featured athlete from their coaches and training partners - as well as the athlete themselves - about preparing for their sport. What do they bring to the sport as individuals - and what do they gain by being at the top of their game? Featuring Anton Tokarchuk

programme.title: After The Fight - Chad Anheliger
programme.sub-title: After The Fight - Chad Anheliger
programme.desc: Chad Anheliger is well rounded in most fight sports but has been having issues with hip flexibility and a long-term shoulder injury. After some time with Sports Conditioning coach Marie Michalski, he learns valuable skills to make him a stronger fighter.
